about_the_game:
1979 Revolution: Black Friday's original soundtrack by Nima Fakhrara features 21 tracks of original music both from and inspired by the game.

File will be installed to:
...Steam\steamapps\common\1979 Revolution\1979 Revolution Official Soundtrack

1. 1979
2. Dirt

10. Dreams

13. Let Go

16. Keep It Now
